extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Feasach ar phríobháideachas, slán Adblock do YouTube™. Bloic Fógraí ar YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Shábháil Adblock do Youtube™ thart ar. $savedTime$ de do shaolré.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Taispeáin líon na n-iarratas bactha sa suaitheantas
